Teaching the class about functions.


## packages --- always the tidyverse
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Some concepts


```{r}
f01=function(x) {
  y=x+1
  y^2
}


f01(3)
f01(5)
```


```{r}
f02=function(x,a) {
  y=x+1+a
  y^2
}

f02(3)
f02(3,4)



```

```{r}
a=2
f02(3)
```

```{r}
a=2
f03=function(x) {
  y=x+1+a
  y^2
}

f03(3)

```

```{r}
a=4
f03(3)

a=6
f03(3)

```




```{r}
f04=function(x=5,a=0){
  y=x+1+2*a
  y^2
}
f04()
f04(10)
f04(a=10)
```




```{r}
f2 <- function(x = z) {
  z <- 100
  x
}
f2()
```
